post.content:
Java Web Application Developer


Onestop Media Group (http://onestopmedia.com), Canada's leader in digital out-of-home networks, is looking for a creative, problem solving developer. This position requires someone with experience taking a significant role in several projects, including design and maintenance of our customer web portals.


You will be expected to design, build, document and test your solutions in a team environment. The company wants your input on software development processes and system design.


Your skill set should include:



a strong willingness to teach yourself

3+ years of Java development experience

Web application design and development

JSF, RichFaces, Hibernate, Spring

JQuery, cross-browser HTML/CSS/JavaScript

Release Management/Continuous Build System

The job will challenge and provide amazing opportunities for learning new things. The company provides a powerful dual-head workstation and great coffee in a lively downtown office environment.


Please apply with a cover letter describing why you would fit into our company. They are read, and it's a good way to differentiate your application from the hundreds of bots who will also apply for this job.
post.title: Java Web Application Developer
